channel.title: hide on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in hide on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Fun last lesson before vacation
item.description: Hide and Akiko from 7pm class each needed to make up some lessons, so stayed for the 8pm class featuring Misato and Tatsuya. I think it worked pretty well; they had not met each other, and they are all pretty much similar personalities so I figured they would get along fine. After self intros, most of the time they talked about Akiko’s challenging business trip to Hydrabad, India. Most of the rest of the time we talked about Hide’s work.
